meanings.sent1: He rewinds the toy car adverbly to make it go faster.
meanings.sent2: She rewinds the music adverbly to listen to her favorite part again.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel rewinds the acorn adverbly before burying it in the ground.
meanings.sent4: Time rewinds adverbly as the clock ticks backwards.
meanings.sent5: The magician rewinds the trick adverbly to perform it flawlessly.

meanings.sent1: He rewinds the fishing line to bring in the big catch.
meanings.sent2: She rewinds the story to the beginning to understand it better.
meanings.sent3: The detective rewinds the evidence to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Memories rewind in his mind, taking him back to that special moment.
meanings.sent5: The athlete rewinds his training routine to improve his performance.

meanings.definition: To reverse the winding of a tape or film
meanings.sent1: She rewinds the VHS tape to watch the movie from the start.
meanings.sent2: He rewinds the film to review the scene for editing.
meanings.sent3: The cat rewinds the yarn ball, causing a tangled mess.
meanings.sent4: Life rewinds like a movie reel, showing moments in reverse.
meanings.sent5: The teacher rewinds the educational video to clarify a concept for the students.
